com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter

Class NavigationDrawerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.CursorAdapter
        • com.giift.sdk.ui.adapter.NavigationDrawerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class NavigationDrawerAdapter
extends android.widget.CursorAdapter
    Adapter used to display a list of favorite cards in the navigation drawer:
    • Favourites.COLUMN_ITEM_NAME
    • Favourites.COLUMN_ITEM_IMAGE_PATH
    Author:
    vieony on 7/4/2015.
